Entry.JapaneseText: エトス
Entry.EnglishText: Ethos

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>

Entry.JapaneseText: 空からの訪問者
Entry.EnglishText: Thing From The Sky

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mel>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mel>

Entry.JapaneseText: アルベルト
Entry.EnglishText: Albert

Entry.JapaneseText: Variable
Entry.EnglishText: Variable

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>、危ない…… 近づかないの……！
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>, it could be dangerous... Don't get too close to it...!

Entry.JapaneseText: うぉっ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Whoa!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぷっは〜、 びっくらこいた、 おどろいた、と
Entry.EnglishText: Ta-dah! Did I surprise you?

Entry.JapaneseText: 危うくバラバラになるとこだど。 帰ったら文句言ってやんねぇと、 ぶつぶつぶつ、と…
Entry.EnglishText: I thought I'd be scattered all over the place, but turned out to be a really nice landing. The journey was pretty rough, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんだ、おめぇら、 人のことジロジロ見て
Entry.EnglishText: Oh! People are staring at me so infatuatedly!

Entry.JapaneseText: はっはっはぁ〜ん、 このアルベルト様の格好良さに 見とれてるんだべな？
Entry.EnglishText: Hehehe. Do I, the great Albert, bear such a nice figure to be observed like this?

Entry.JapaneseText: アルベルト……？
Entry.EnglishText: I take it your name is... Albert...?

Entry.JapaneseText: んだんだ、そうだど
Entry.EnglishText: Yep, that'd be correct.

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルン様のお達しで、 おめぇらのとこに来てやっただ。 感謝せぇよ
Entry.EnglishText: ...And since I’m such a good friend of Miss Norn I couldn’t refuse when she asked me to come all the way here. Congratulations, you get to meet me!
Entry.Notes: ...And since I’m such good friends with Miss Norn I couldn’t refuse when she asked me to come all the way here. Congratulations, you get to meet me! ~Gator

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルンの……！？ どういうこと？
Entry.EnglishText: Friend of Norn...!? Could it be THAT Norn...!?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ〜ぁ、 長旅してきたもんで、 腹減っちまっただなぁ
Entry.EnglishText: Ah! I'm so worn out from that long trip!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふかし芋の ひとつやふたつ、 出てこんもんか？
Entry.EnglishText: You've made me wait outside forever. Pfft, you really must be country bumpkins if your manners are this poor.
Entry.Notes: maybe "Pfff, you must really be country bumpkins with manners like that." ~Gator

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃ、じゃあ…… ひとまず中に……
Entry.EnglishText: W-Well I guess you can come inside our house for the time being...

Entry.JapaneseText: あー、そったら中行くだが。 芋だけじゃなく、 茶も出すんだど
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, let's get inside, yes! Maybe you're not that much of a country bumpkin, after all. But don't worry—I understand how much you desired a tea party outside with me.
Entry.Notes: I don't think that's quite right. May need a translator to review that.
